subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Tesing-testing
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
So you're just sitting there with baited breath hoping and praying nothing
will happen so you can puff out chest and say see I told you it's all BS.

 I do have more information for the date, but not posting till afterwards.
If it's real, I don't want it getting out to soon.  I did tell a couple
others so you can't claim it's prediction after the fact. Doesn't matter
though, cuz the skeptics ignore all facts anyway.

 F-S
